source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP 1000 
    fld_ACT_id,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_GR_batch_id)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_GR_batch_id,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_GR_aim_matl_no)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_GR_aim_matl_no,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_id_message)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_id_message,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_plant)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_plant,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_doc_date)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_doc_date,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_postg_date)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_postg_date,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_tot_qty)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_tot_qty,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_qty_d)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_qty_d,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_opr_actv_no)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_opr_actv_no,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_prod_ord_no)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_prod_ord_no,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no1)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no1,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty1)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty1,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom1)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom1,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no2)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no2,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty2)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty2,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom2)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom2,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no3)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no3,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty3)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty3,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom3)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom3,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no4)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no4,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty4)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty4,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom4)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom4,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no5)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no5,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty5)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty5,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom5)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom5,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no6)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no6,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty6)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty6,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom6)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom6,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_sal_ord_no)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_sal_ord_no,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_item_no)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_item_no,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_pcode)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_pcode,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_shift)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_shift,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_clbd_item)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_clbd_item,
    fld_ACT_rec_type,
    fld_ACT_status,
    ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_wrk_cnt)), ''), ' ') AS fld_ACT_wrk_cnt
FROM 
    tbl_sts_dns_act_con
WHERE 
    (fld_ACT_status = 'I' AND fld_ACT_rec_type = 'A') OR (fld_ACT_status = 'I' AND fld_ACT_rec_type = 'Z')

scripts.text:
WITH update_status AS (
    SELECT TOP 1000 fld_ACT_id,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_GR_batch_id)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_GR_batch_id,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_GR_aim_matl_no)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_GR_aim_matl_no,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_id_message)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_id_message,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_plant)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_plant,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_doc_date)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_doc_date,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_postg_date)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_postg_date,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_tot_qty)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_tot_qty,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_qty_d)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_qty_d,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_opr_actv_no)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_opr_actv_no,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_prod_ord_no)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_prod_ord_no,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no1)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no1,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty1)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty1,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom1)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom1,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no2)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no2,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty2)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty2,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom2)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom2,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no3)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no3,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty3)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty3,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom3)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom3,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no4)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no4,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty4)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty4,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom4)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom4,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no5)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no5,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty5)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty5,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom5)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom5,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_no6)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_no6,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_qty6)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_qty6,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_act_uom6)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_act_uom6,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_sal_ord_no)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_sal_ord_no,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_item_no)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_item_no,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_pcode)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_pcode,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_shift)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_shift,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_clbd_item)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_clbd_item,
        fld_ACT_rec_type,
        fld_ACT_status,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(fld_ACT_wrk_cnt)),''),' ') AS fld_ACT_wrk_cnt
    FROM tbl_sts_dns_act_con
    WHERE (fld_ACT_status = 'P' AND fld_ACT_rec_type = 'A') OR (fld_ACT_status = 'P' AND fld_ACT_rec_type = 'Z')
)
UPDATE update_status
SET fld_ACT_status = 'I'
